attributes.action: Those on benefits shouldn’t receive more money then a working family/individual
attributes.additional_details:
There should also be physicals for disability claims tested by a doctor working for the system not his/her own GP surgery 
This should be carried out every 6 months and also be watched by a investigator  to make sure claims are Lidget
attributes.background: It is ridiculous that a family/individual that has never even thought about working are receiving more benefits than working families or individuals this also including a stop to housing benefit... CAP them to a Minimum waging come NOW

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure what you mean by "receive more benefits than working families". 

You can find out more about benefits for families here: 

https://www.gov.uk/browse/benefits/families

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd the UK Government and Parliament to do.

You will need to give your full name to start a petition.
